rukus.text: Kandi rwose twahaye Musa igitabo (Tawurati), ariko nticyavugwaho rumwe. N’iyo bitaza kuba ijambo ryaturutse kwa Nyagasani wawe ryabanje (ryo kudahaniraho), bari guhita bacirirwaho iteka (ryo kurimbuka). Ndetse mu by’ukuri (iyi Qur’an) bayishidikanyaho biteye inkeke
Kandi mu by’ukuri Nyagasani wawe bose azabahembera ibikorwa byabo byuzuye. Rwose azi neza ibyo bakora
Ngaho (yewe Muhamadi) komeza ugire igihagararo (mu idini) nk’uko wabitegetswe wowe n’abicujije muri kumwe, kandi ntimuzarengere (amategeko ya Allah). Mu by’ukuri We ni Ubona bihebuje ibyo mukora
Kandi ntimukabogamire kuri ba bandi bakora ibibi, mutazavaho mugerwaho n’umuriro kandi mutabona abawubarinda batari Allah, ndetse mukaba mutabona ababatabara

Kandi (yewe Muhamadi) ujye uhozaho iswala mu mpera ebyiri z’amanywa (Swalat ul Fajir, Adhuhuri na Al aswir), ndetse no mu masaha y’ijoro (Al magrib na Al ishai). Mu by’ukuri ibikorwa byiza bikuraho ibibi. Ibyo ni inyigisho ku bantu bibuka
Ujye unihangana kuko mu by’ukuri Allah ataburizamo ibihembo by’abakora ibyiza

Mu bakurambere banyu (twarimbuye) iyo haza kubamo abanyabwenge babuza (abandi gukora) ubwangizi ku isi (bari kurokoka ibihano)! Nyamara (ibyo ntibyabaye) kuko byakozwe na bake twarokoye, mu gihe ba bandi bakoze ibibi bakomeje kuba mu munezero w’iby’isi, kandi bari n’inkozi z’ibibi
Kandi Nyagasani wawe ntiyari kurimbura imidugudu ayirenganyije, mu gihe abayituye ari intungane
N’iyo Nyagasani wawe aza kubishaka, abantu bose yari kubagira umuryango umwe (bakayoboka idini rimwe rya Isilamu). Ariko bazakomeza kutavuga rumwe (mu madini yabo)

Uretse abo Nyagasani wawe yagiriye impuhwe (bakayoboka ukuri); no ku bw’ibyo ni cyo yabaremeye. Kandi ijambo rya Nyagasani wawe ryasohoye (rigira riti) “Mu by’ukuri umuriro wa Jahanamu nzawuzuza (inkozi z’ibibi) zose, mu majini no mu bantu.”
Kandi (yewe Muhamadi) inkuru zose z’Intumwa twagutekerereje, zari izo kugukomeza umutima. Ndetse no muri ibi (izi nkuru) wagezweho n’ukuri, inyigisho zikaba n’urwibutso ku bemeramana
Unabwire ba bandi batemera uti “Nimukore uko mubishaka (muzabona iherezo ryanyu). Mu by’ukuri natwe turakora (nk’uko Allah yadutegetse).”
Ibitagaragara byo mu birere no mu isi ni ibya Allah, kandi iwe ni ho ibintu byose bigarurwa. Ngaho mugaragire unamwiringire. Kandi Nyagasani wawe ntayobewe ibyo mukora
